text.headline: Ventilation Successes
text.text: The times in the COVID-19 pandemic when applied ventilation lessons paid off and allowed for some normality. A timeline - swipe right to click the '>' button to begin

text.headline: US Gym With infected trainer: No outbreak
text.text: "A gym trainer exposed 50 athletes to COVID-19, but no one got sick â€” because one member is a ventilation expert who redesigned the room's layout" - from insider.com article. See also @linseymarr tweet.
